titles.title: No Obamacare Mandate Act
A bill to repeal the medical device tax and the employer and individual responsibility requirements of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
No Obamacare Mandate Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
No Obamacare Mandate Act
This bill repeals provisions of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act that impose: (1) an excise tax on medical devices, (2) a requirement that individuals obtain minimum essential health care coverage, and (3) a penalty on large employers who fail to offer health care coverage to their eligible employees.
